sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND(
QYMC, ZYFZR, XXDZ, LXDH, SJZG, YZBM, JCRQ, CYRS, JJLX, KZ, KDZC, NLR, WKKMC, DLWZ, WKKXS, WKKXSQT, WKKDB, QKR, BG, SJZKR, SJZBG, BC, ZXGTCD, CJGTPJPD, WKKWHCDFL, WKKAQDFL, SFYZWH, JBLD, YWHPT, YWNSL, FYDQ, YWLF, BX, CQBG, CQBC, DBFF, DG, WKFJSBXH, SL, HSMJ, CQ, ZHQ, WKBAQCG, WKKDHKR, PHXTDXS, WKLD, WKBZ, WKKDGCXM, WKKGS, WKXKBKGS, JJFF, BZ, TBR, TBRLXDH, TBRQ,
ID, STATUS, CREATED, CREATE_TIME, UPDATED, UPDATE_TIME) values(
#qymc#, #zyfzr#, #xxdz#, #lxdh#, #sjzg#, #yzbm#, #jcrq#, #cyrs#, #jjlx#, #kz#, #kdzc#, #nlr#, #wkkmc#, #dlwz#, #wkkxs#, #wkkxsqt#, #wkkdb#, #qkr#, #bg#, #sjzkr#, #sjzbg#, #bc#, #zxgtcd#, #cjgtpjpd#, #wkkwhcdfl#, #wkkaqdfl#, #sfyzwh#, #jbld#, #ywhpt#, #ywnsl#, #fydq#, #ywlf#, #bx#, #cqbg#, #cqbc#, #dbff#, #dg#, #wkfjsbxh#, #sl#, #hsmj#, #cq#, #zhq#, #wkbaqcg#, #wkkdhkr#, #phxtdxs#, #wkld#, #wkbz#, #wkkdgcxm#, #wkkgs#, #wkxkbkgs#, #jjff#, #bz#, #tbr#, #tbrlxdh#, #tbrq#,
#id#, #status#, #created#, #createTime#, #updated#, #updateTime#)
sqlMap.delete: UPDATE TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND SET STATUS='0' WHERE ID=#id#

TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND.YWHPT AS ywhpt, TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND.YWNSL AS ywnsl, TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND.FYDQ AS fydq, TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND.YWLF AS ywlf, TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND.BX AS bx, TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND.CQBG AS cqbg, TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND.CQBC AS cqbc, TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND.DBFF AS dbff, TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND.DG AS dg, TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND.WKFJSBXH AS wkfjsbxh, TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND.WKKDHKR AS wkkdhkr, TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND.PHXTDXS AS phxtdxs, TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND.WKLD AS wkld, TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND.WKBZ AS wkbz, TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND.WKKDGCXM AS wkkdgcxm, TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND.WKKGS AS wkkgs, TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND.WKXKBKGS AS wkxkbkgs, TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND.JJFF AS jjff, TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND.BZ AS bz, TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND.TBR AS tbr, TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND.TBRLXDH AS tbrlxdh, TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND.TBRQ AS tbrq,
TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND.ID AS id, TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND.STATUS AS status, TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND.CREATED AS created, TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND.UPDATED AS updated, TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime from TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND LEFT JOIN TB_ENTERPRISE ON TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND.QYMC = TB_ENTERPRISE.ID where TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND.ID=#id#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND
QYMC=#qymc# ZYFZR=#zyfzr# XXDZ=#xxdz# LXDH=#lxdh# SJZG=#sjzg# YZBM=#yzbm# JCRQ=#jcrq# CYRS=#cyrs# JJLX=#jjlx# KZ=#kz# KDZC=#kdzc# NLR=#nlr# WKKMC=#wkkmc# DLWZ=#dlwz# WKKXS=#wkkxs# WKKXSQT=#wkkxsqt# WKKDB=#wkkdb# QKR=#qkr# BG=#bg# SJZKR=#sjzkr# SJZBG=#sjzbg# BC=#bc# ZXGTCD=#zxgtcd# CJGTPJPD=#cjgtpjpd# WKKWHCDFL=#wkkwhcdfl# WKKAQDFL=#wkkaqdfl# SFYZWH=#sfyzwh# JBLD=#jbld# YWHPT=#ywhpt# YWNSL=#ywnsl# FYDQ=#fydq# YWLF=#ywlf# BX=#bx# CQBG=#cqbg# CQBC=#cqbc# DBFF=#dbff# DG=#dg# WKFJSBXH=#wkfjsbxh# SL=#sl# HSMJ=#hsmj# CQ=#cq# ZHQ=#zhq# WKBAQCG=#wkbaqcg# WKKDHKR=#wkkdhkr# PHXTDXS=#phxtdxs# WKLD=#wkld# WKBZ=#wkbz# WKKDGCXM=#wkkdgcxm# WKKGS=#wkkgs# WKXKBKGS=#wkxkbkgs# JJFF=#jjff# BZ=#bz# TBR=#tbr# TBRLXDH=#tbrlxdh# TBRQ=#tbrq#
ID=#id# STATUS=#status# CREATED=#created# CREATE_TIME=#createTime# UPDATED=#updated# UPDATE_TIME=#updateTime#
WHERE ID=#id#

SELECT COUNT(*) from TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND LEFT JOIN TB_ENTERPRISE ON TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND.QYMC = TB_ENTERPRISE.ID WHERE TB_HAZHARDS_TAILINGSPOND.STATUS = '1'
